function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in the building","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems and use air cleaners","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UVGI, ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Contaminated air from toilet facilities","Impact":"Risk of cross-contamination and spread of infections","Mitigation":"Maintain negative pressure in toilets, use air cleaning equipment","Technologies":"HVAC filters, UV cleaning equipment","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Leakage in heat recovery equipment","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of heat exchange and potential spread of contaminants","Mitigation":"Regularly check heat recovery equipment for leakage and increase outdoor air ventilation if leakage is detected","Technologies":"Inspection of heat recovery wheels, adjustment of outdoor air ventilation","People":"Maintenance personnel","Owner":"Building management"}]}
